Name: Mint Fizz
Ingredients: 5 ml Giffard Menthe Pastille white crème de menthe
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda and briefly stir.
Review: Long, refreshing citrus and mint fizz.
